title: FF! Doc | LogContextPipe
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

SapLUWManagerPipe
LogContextPipe
PipesSession
Pipe that stores all its parameter values in the ThreadContext, formerly known as Mapped Diagnostic Context (MDC), to be used in logging. The input is passed through to the output.
See also
Github - LogContextPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.LogContextPipe
Syntax
Copy
<LogContextPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
export	boolean	false
If true the ThreadContext parameters will be exported from the current PipeLine up in the call tree.
continueOnError	boolean	false
If true the pipe will never forward to the ExceptionForward even if an error occurred during execution.
FixedForwardPipe
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE
